about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: Welcome to our cake shop! We are passionate about creating delicious cakes using traditional Brazilian and international recipes with high-quality ingredients.
about.paragraph2: Our team of experienced bakers works every day to bring you fresh cakes with amazing fillings and toppings, plus custom catering services for your special events.
about.paragraph3: We believe in the art of cake making and the joy it brings to our community. Every cake is made with care and attention to detail.
about.value1: Quality: We use only the finest ingredients
about.value2: Tradition: Brazilian and international cake recipes
about.value3: Freshness: Made fresh daily with care
about.value4: Community: Serving our neighbors with pride

catering.title: Catering Services
catering.subtitle: Perfect for your special occasions
catering.intro1: We offer comprehensive catering services for all types of events. Our experienced team will work with you to create the perfect menu for your occasion.
catering.intro2: From intimate gatherings to large celebrations, we provide fresh, delicious food that will impress your guests.
catering.intro3: All our catering options are customizable to meet your specific needs and dietary requirements.
catering.menuIntro: Our catering menu features a wide selection of freshly prepared items.
catering.category1Items: Sandwiches, Wraps, Salads, Hot dishes, Appetizers, Main courses, Side dishes
catering.category2Items: Cakes, Pastries, Cookies, Desserts, Sweet breads, Specialty items, Custom creations
catering.category3Items: Coffee, Tea, Juices, Soft drinks, Custom beverage packages
catering.menuOutro: All items are prepared fresh on the day of your event.
catering.step1Text: Reach out to discuss your event details, number of guests, and preferences.
catering.step2Text: We'll work together to create a customized menu that fits your needs and budget.
catering.step3Text: Once you approve the menu and details, we'll confirm your booking and timeline.
catering.step4Text: We'll prepare and deliver everything fresh, ensuring your event is a success.

service1.title: Corporate Events
service1.description: Perfect for business meetings, conferences, and office celebrations.
service1.examples: Breakfast platters, Lunch boxes, Coffee breaks, Meeting packages

service2.title: Private Parties
service2.description: Make your celebration special with our custom catering options.
service2.examples: Birthday cakes, Party platters, Appetizer selections, Dessert tables, Themed menus, Custom orders

service3.title: Special Occasions
service3.description: Elegant catering for weddings, anniversaries, and milestone events.
service3.examples: Wedding cakes, Buffet service, Elegant appetizers, Multi-course meals, Champagne service, Custom desserts, Fine dining options

catering.contactText: Interested in our catering services? Get in touch to discuss your event and receive a custom quote.

confirmation.title: Order Confirmed!
confirmation.message: Your order has been successfully placed. We will contact you shortly to confirm delivery details. You will receive an email confirmation at the address you provided.

productDescriptions.1: Brazilian chocolate cake covered with brigadeiro
productDescriptions.2: Traditional carrot cake with chocolate topping
productDescriptions.4: Sweet cornmeal cake, a Brazilian classic
productDescriptions.6: Classic vanilla cake with smooth frosting
productDescriptions.7: Moist red velvet with cream cheese
productDescriptions.8: Fresh strawberry cake with whipped cream
productDescriptions.9: Thin layers of guava rolled cake

productFullDescriptions.1: Our signature Brigadeiro Cake features layers of moist chocolate sponge covered with creamy brigadeiro (Brazilian chocolate truffle). A beloved Brazilian classic that melts in your mouth.
productFullDescriptions.2: Traditional Brazilian Bolo de Cenoura - a super moist carrot cake topped with rich chocolate ganache. Made with fresh carrots and pure chocolate.
productFullDescriptions.3: Prestígio Cake inspired by the famous Brazilian candy. Layers of chocolate cake with coconut cream filling, covered in chocolate ganache and shredded coconut.
productFullDescriptions.4: Traditional Bolo de Fubá - a sweet cornmeal cake with a tender crumb. Often enjoyed with coffee, this Brazilian classic is simple yet delicious.
productFullDescriptions.5: Decadent chocolate layer cake with rich chocolate buttercream frosting. Perfect for chocolate lovers, with moist layers and smooth filling.
productFullDescriptions.6: Classic vanilla birthday cake with light, fluffy layers and smooth vanilla buttercream. Can be customized with your choice of decorations and fillings.
productFullDescriptions.7: Moist red velvet cake with cream cheese frosting. Beautiful red layers with a hint of cocoa and tangy cream cheese topping.
productFullDescriptions.8: Fresh strawberry cake with whipped cream and strawberry filling. Light sponge layers with fresh fruit and airy cream.
productFullDescriptions.9: Traditional Bolo de Rolo from Pernambuco, Brazil. Thin layers of sponge rolled with guava paste, creating a beautiful spiral pattern.
productFullDescriptions.10: Tres Leches - sponge cake soaked in three types of milk (evaporated, condensed, and cream). Topped with whipped cream and cinnamon.
productFullDescriptions.11: Complete breakfast platter including cakes, sweet items, and beverages. Perfect for morning meetings or events.
productFullDescriptions.12: Assorted selection of savory and sweet items perfect for parties and gatherings.
productFullDescriptions.13: Beautiful assortment of our finest cakes and sweet treats. Great for celebrations.
productFullDescriptions.14: Full catering package with customizable options for your event. Contact us for details.
